parts.text: {"word":"rejoined","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"再び加わる、再加入する、復帰する","english_definition":"to join again; to come together again; to become a member of (an organization, group, etc.) again.","examples":[{"sentence":"He rejoined the company after a year's absence.","translation":"彼は1年間の休職後、会社に復帰した。"},{"sentence":"She rejoined the team after recovering from her injury.","translation":"彼女は怪我から回復した後、チームに再加入した。"},{"sentence":"The two countries rejoined diplomatic relations.","translation":"両国は外交関係を再開した。"}],"collocations":["rejoin a company (会社に復帰する)","rejoin a team (チームに再加入する)","rejoin a group (グループに再加入する)","rejoin diplomatic relations (外交関係を再開する)"],"synonyms":["reunite","reconnect","re-enter","return to"],"antonyms":["leave","depart","separate","disjoin"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"(会話などに)再び割り込む、再び口を挟む","english_definition":""to say something after someone else has spoken; to interject again in a conversation."","examples":[{"sentence":"He rejoined the conversation with a witty remark.","translation":"彼は機知に富んだ発言で会話に再び割り込んだ。"},{"sentence":"She rejoined, 'But what about the cost?'","translation":"彼女は『でも費用はどうなるの？』と再び口を挟んだ。"}],"collocations":["rejoin a conversation (会話に再び割り込む)","rejoin with a remark (発言で再び口を挟む)"],"synonyms":["interject","retort","reply","respond"],"antonyms":["remain silent","stop talking"]}],"etymology":{"value":"「re-」（再び）と「join」（加わる）の組み合わせ。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/riːˈdʒɔɪnd/","syllables":"re-joined"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["rejoin","rejoins"],"past_simple":"rejoined","past_participle":"rejoined","present_participle":"rejoining"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**rejoined**」は「rejoin」の過去形・過去分詞形で、「再び加わる」「再加入する」という意味です。組織、チーム、会社など、以前所属していたものに再び参加する場合に使われます。また、会話に再び割り込むという意味もあります。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ He rejoined to the club.","correct":"✓ He rejoined the club.","note":"「rejoin」は他動詞なので、前置詞「to」は不要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ She rejoined at the conversation.","correct":"✓ She rejoined the conversation.","note":"会話に割り込む場合も、前置詞は不要です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["rejoin (動詞: 再び加わる)","rejoining (名詞: 再加入)"],"phrasal_verbs":[],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的低頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**rejoined**」は、以前に所属していたグループや組織に再び参加することを意味する動詞「rejoin」の過去形または過去分詞形です。たとえば、休暇後に職場に戻る場合や、以前所属していたクラブに再加入する場合に使用されます。また、会話に再び参加するという意味もあります。この単語は、フォーマルな文脈でよく使用されます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"After a year of traveling, she **rejoined** her former colleagues at the office.","translation":"1年間の旅行の後、彼女はオフィスで以前の同僚たちと再び合流した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"再び加わる (会社)"},{"sentence":"He **rejoined** the debate with a passionate argument.","translation":"彼は情熱的な議論で討論に再び加わった。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"再び加わる (会話)"},{"sentence":"The country **rejoined** the international trade agreement after a period of isolation.","translation":"その国は孤立期間を経て、国際貿易協定に再び参加した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"再び加わる (国際協定)"}]}
